channel.title: Help with a fishing script please
channel.description:
:confused: hi , i got a scipt which fishes but i need to tell it to move on from 1 fishing spot after the spot dies, and i dont know how i can get scar to detect the spot has died.
i have tried using bitmap to detect when there is no lobster pot on the screen (the one that dips in the water) , but it didnt work, and also i have tried to use bitmaps to detect when there is no picture of my feet on the screen (because when u fish with pot, you bend over it reveals a picture of your feet^^). This didnt work either, so maybe i've got the coding slightly wrong or my images arent clear enough, i am not entirely sure. I am willing to show you the code if you want to help ..thx ;)
